text: No weekend work, hours are 7am to 5pm. Our client distributes specialist building materials to builders within a 30-40 mile radius of their Reading base. They now need an experienced driver to accurately deliver customer orders for despatch in their own vehicles. You will be driving an Isuzu N75. 190 which has an onboard crane & be expected to demonstrate ultimate customer service. The role: Delivering materials to customers premises & sites. Order picking and assisting the loading. Daily vehicle checks. Maintaining a safe working environment. Other related duties as required. The person: Physically fit & healthy. this is a manual job often lifting heavy items. Counterbalance forklift licence (not essential as training will be given). Positive helpful attitude. Good communication skills. Current CPC & Tacho card. Experience with Hi-ab type on-board crane would be beneficial. Holidays: 28 days per year including bank holidays. 4-5 days Christmas shutdown.
